newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Taylors to buy Gullivers Laundry Ltd.
newsitem.headline: Taylors to buy Gullivers Laundry Ltd.

text.p: Taylors Group Ltd said on Tuesday it had entered into an agreement to purchase the assets, stock and business name of Gullivers Laundry ltd, a commercial laundry operation in Auckland.
Taylors said the total purchase price for the business was a maximum of NZ$2.2 million with the final amount subject to stock take.

"The new operation will make a positive, but not significant, contribution to the 1996/97 profit results after taking up finance and acquisition costs, and is expected to make a useful contribution to the 1998 results," Taylors said in a statement.
Gullivers provides textile rental and laundry services to industry and commerce throughout Auckland.

"Entry into this market is a new venture for Taylors and opens up access to new markets where Taylors has had until now minimal involvement," Taylors said, adding it proposed to continue to operate the Gullivers business from the existing facility as an ongoing concern.
Taylors would take over Gullivers' operation on May 1.
